Hi,

Can you specify the exact Tomcat 7 version that you are using. Also specify whether you are using the "embedded" distribution or the full one.

Please provide the configuration information that is used for the Embedded Tomcat. Also information for the loader that you are setting to the context.

You may check one of the Tomcat tests that uses embedded Tomcat and deploys a web application with filter definitions [1].
